messages.subject: UWG Registration Begins......
messages.msgSnippet: Registration for the 4th Annual Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering begins THIS Friday, Oct 1st! http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/ Be sure to register as soon as
messages.messageBody:
Registration for the 4th Annual Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering begins THIS Friday, Oct 1st!






http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/





Be
sure to register as soon as possible, especially those wanting one of
the full kitchen suites. These room types are always our group's most
popular and the first to completely fill-up.





Keynote Opening Speaker: PAT FARENGA





EVENING FEATURED SPEAKERS


     * James Marcus Bach ( Secrets of a Buccaneer Scholar)


     * Lisa Cottrell - Bentley (Wright on Time Book Series)


     * Zoe Bentley - 13 yr old unschooler and 2nd place winner of NASA's No Boundaries national competition! )


     * Dayna Martin (Radical Unschooling, A revolution has begun)





OTHER SPEAKERS:


     * Heather Burditt & TJ Phillips


     * Erica Davis- Pitre


     * Cindy Gaddis


     * Ruth Radney


     * Laura Weldon


     * Richard Grudzinski


     * and more to come!!!!!





Lots of new events and activities are planned including:


     * Sunday Night Pool Party (for those arriving a day early)


     * Group Mentoring


     * Family Meet and Greet Speed Dating


     * Field Trips (Cedar Pt amusement Park, Lake Erie Ferry Rides, Edison Birthplace Museum. Sandusky NASA tours, etc....)


     * And LOTS More!





Be sure to join our yahoo group for further info on the Gathering, how to register and to keep up with all the latest info and updates.


http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/








The UWG Organizers,


      Carol Reinhard - Founder / Gathering Coordinator (carolfhs79@... )


      Kimberly Conti - Speaker Coordinator


      Kim Lowery - Main Events Coordinator


      Bethany Ward - Funshops Coordinator





[Also, Please help us spread the word by telling / posting this to all your unschooly friends and groups. THANKS!!!!]











[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
